backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing products and inquiries with CRUD-style functions, auto-incrementing product IDs, and query endpoints for retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented feature IDs, affected files, components, and test references for contact updates and watermark feature.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including styling, routing, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes, including color tokens and global background/foreground settings.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document defining the root mount point and setting the site title for SISTER TELESYSTEM.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router and applying a root layout with a site-wide watermark, header, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component showing brand info, navigation links, services list, and updated contact details with address, phone, and email.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation, and active-route highlighting using TanStack Router state.
frontend/src/content/sampleContent.ts: Provides sample store info, product listings with BigInt IDs, and service descriptions for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Updates the browser tab title and restores the previous title on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context provider handling auth client creation, identity loading, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all products and submitting inquiries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode settings, utilities, and custom components like product grids and watermarks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with story content, values, branding, and sets the document title.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with store info, an inquiry form using mutation, and success handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component showing hero section, featured products, and feature cards using backend or sample product data.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Products listing page with search, category and brand filters, using backend or sample products.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services page displaying a grid of sample services with mapped icons and a section explaining service benefits.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Utility function formatting bigint prices as INR currency using en-IN locale.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, notes, and current build context for the mobile store website.
